name: Glacier
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.
The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
What is the project about? A ve(3,3) DEX on AVAX C-Chain


What makes your project unique? The highest grossing ve(3,3) DEX on AVAX C-Chain and the only one KYC'd with AVA Labs, multiple exclusive partners like Yield Yak and GMX


History of your project. Launched on March 30th with over 18m TVL in 2 days, over 100k a day in volume, and adding more everyday


What’s next for your project? More partners, competitions involving trading, and a few things we cant talk about just yet


What can your token be used for? GLCR can be locked into an ERC-721 called veGLCR to vote on LPs every week to earn fees and bribes from the pair
